knimeNode.name: Show Config
knimeNode.shortDescription: Permits downloading of Mascot DAT files via a JAX-WS web service and will load each dat file into the output table as per the mascot reader. The node also saves the DAT files to the user-specified folder.

fullDescription.intro: Displays the current configuration of the Mascot server, mainly useful for debugging.
fullDescription.option: The default is currently valid for plantcell.unimelb.edu.au users, however any url may be entered here where MascotEE has been installed.

ports.outPort: Table of reported mascot configuration entries, one row per setting
